name: Operation: KIA
description:
Welcome human! Try to survive in me! Arachnomar! Kill zombies and feed me their souls so I can be all powerfu… I mean so I can live to see my dear grandkids. Ahem. If you fail, your family will die! HAHAHAHAHA

  • 3 Levels
  • 1 Weapon
  • 3 Zombies

Fight your way through this crunched and rushed piece of… art? Oh gosh no….

Well. This mess was hard to make. So yeah.. enjoy? I guess…
